titles.title: Century Farms Act of 2017
Century Farms Act of 2017
A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a program to recognize farms that have been in continuous operation for 100 years.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary:
Century Farms Act of 2017
This bill requires the Department of Agriculture to establish a program to recognize: (1) any farm that a state department of agriculture or similar statewide agricultural organization recognizes as a Century Farm, or (2) a farm or ranch that has been operated continuously and owned by the same family for at least 100 consecutive years.
